Player History
Drafted in 11th round, 168th overall pick, by St. Louis (B) in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Henry Lee (CHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/8/2015, off Tobias Ortiz (BRO)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/17/2015, hitting .435 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Houston on 7/27/2015...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/31/2015, hitting .500 with 1 HR, 11 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/15/2016 to a 5-year deal worth $11,250,000 per year...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/2017, hitting .379 with 1 HR, 24 RBI...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against San Francisco on 7/7/2017...
Had 26-game hitting streak snapped on 7/23/2017...
Traded from Cincinnati to San Francisco on 1/31/2018 (Going to SF: RF Filiberto Tomas, 3B Gaby Realego, P Kevin Nelson, P Edward Lawhon. Going to CIN: P Philip Finklea, P Alberto Fresno, P Rober
to Ortiz, 2B Estanis Aguilar, RF Fred Bondurant)...
